Package edu.ncsu.csc316.cleaning.manager

Class ReportManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc316.cleaning.manager.ReportManager
  • public class ReportManager
extends java.lang.Object
    ReportManager handles behaviors associated with generating String reports for the user interface, including (1) vacuum bag reports, (2) frequency reports, and (3) room reports.
    Author:
    Dr. King

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter DATE_TIME_FORMAT
      The format that dates will be inputted and outputted in the manager

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ReportManager​(java.lang.String pathToRoomFile, java.lang.String pathToLogFile)
      Constructs a new ReportManager for building reports of cleaning history information from the provided file with room information and the provided file with cleaning log event information.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String getFrequencyReport​(int number)
      Returns a report of the top X rooms cleaned, sorted from most frequent to least frequent.
      java.lang.String getRoomReport()
      Returns a report that includes a list of cleaning log events associated with each room.
      java.lang.String getVacuumBagReport​(java.lang.String timestamp)
      Returns a report that indicates how many square feet remain to be cleaned until a vacuum bag change is recommended.

    • Field Detail

      • DATE_TIME_FORMAT

        public static final java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter DATE_TIME_FORMAT
        The format that dates will be inputted and outputted in the manager

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReportManager

        public ReportManager​(java.lang.String pathToRoomFile,
                     java.lang.String pathToLogFile)
              throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Constructs a new ReportManager for building reports of cleaning history information from the provided file with room information and the provided file with cleaning log event information.
        Parameters:
        pathToRoomFile - the path to the file that contains room information
        pathToLogFile - the path to the file that contains cleaning event log information
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if either the room file or the cleaning event log file cannot be read

    • Method Detail

      • getVacuumBagReport

        public java.lang.String getVacuumBagReport​(java.lang.String timestamp)
        Returns a report that indicates how many square feet remain to be cleaned until a vacuum bag change is recommended.
        Parameters:
        timestamp - the date and time of the previous vacuum bag change
        Returns:
        a report that indicates how many more square feet can be cleaned until a vacuum bag change is recommened

      • getFrequencyReport

        public java.lang.String getFrequencyReport​(int number)
        Returns a report of the top X rooms cleaned, sorted from most frequent to least frequent.
        Parameters:
        number - the number of rooms to include in the report
        Returns:
        a report of the top X rooms cleaned

      • getRoomReport

        public java.lang.String getRoomReport()
        Returns a report that includes a list of cleaning log events associated with each room. The report lists rooms in alphabetical (ascending) order, and cleaning log entries for each room as sorted in descending chronological order (most recent to oldest).
        Returns:
        a report of cleaning log events for each room
